item.description:
What better way to see a concert than sitting at the edge of the sand, with the ocean as a back-drop. Hear a great band as they fill the salt air with the sounds of summer. Then, enjoy a dazzling fireworks display over the ocean. All equaling a great night out. Bring a beach chair and experience what summer should be all about – friends, fun, beach pizza, awesome music, ice cream cones and more!

 

WHERE: On the Beachfront Stage at the top of Broadway
WHEN: Saturday night, September 1st
TIME: Concert: 7:30pm – 10:00pm Fireworks: 10:15pm

Parking: There is a municipal lot, and on street parking, if there is a meter you will have to pay.

We will only wait 15 minutes for you to arrive at the meeting place, if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

If you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  We thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.

 

We look forward to seeing you as we ROCK the night away!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of Jilly's Pizza and then go find a place to sit.
item.name: Don't Call Me Shirley AND Fireworks!!!!
